Urszula Czerwinska

PhD candidate in systems biology and budding data scientist

urszula.czerwinska@cri-paris.org | urszulaczerwinska | ulalaparis | Urszula Czerwinska


Download CV


Short bio

Born in Poland, I have pursued my education in France and Singapore. Currently based in Paris where I do my PhD and carry on many other projects. I have always been fascinated by complex systems. Through my undergrad studies I have discoverd statistics and programming. Introduced since the begging to Python and R . Experience of living in Singapore tought me how to combine hard work, traveliing and networking. It stimulated my will to work in an interdisciplinary enviroment which I found in Paris. Through versatile projects I got immersed with product & graphical design, business ideas and microbiology. Since then I co-founded a start-up that got transformed into non-profit exploratory project. I have also followed my passion for data and statistical modelingthat leaded me to my PhD. Meanwhile, I have discoverd the whole new universe of Data Science where my skills can serve to solve problems in business, finance, marketing and many others. I became an ambassador of Pivigo Data Science hub to spread ideas of Data Science and help other STEM students to transfer into industry.

I am fascianted about Big Data, IoT and FinTech projects and Data Viz. Don't hesitate to offer me a short-term project or a job in 2018.
